changeSet.id: #2407_20170227-Add due date delay EL in CA
changeSet.author: EdwardLegaspi
AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update ADM_USER as t inner join adm_user as u on t.creator_id = u.id set t.creator = u.username where t.creator_id is not null
update ADM_USER as t inner join adm_user as u on t.updater_id = u.id set t.updater = u.username where t.updater_id is not null

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update ADM_USER set creator = (select username from adm_user where ADM_USER.creator_id = adm_user.id and ADM_USER.creator_id is not null)
update ADM_USER set updater = (select username from adm_user where ADM_USER.updater_id = adm_user.id and ADM_USER.updater_id is not null)

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update ADM_PERMISSION set PERMISSION = RESSOURCE ||'-' || PERMISSION where RESSOURCE like 'CE_%'
update adm_role set role_name='marketingManager' where role_name='MARKETING_MANAGER'

insert into ord_order_seq (select IFNULL(max(id),0)+1 from ord_order)
insert into hierarchy_entity_seq (select IFNULL(max(id),0)+1 from hierarchy_entity)
insert into ord_quote_seq (select IFNULL(max(id),0)+1 from ord_quote)
insert into ord_quote_item_seq (select IFNULL(max(id),0)+1 from ord_quote_item)
insert into wf_decision_rule_seq (select IFNULL(max(id),0)+1 from wf_decision_rule)
insert into WF_HISTORY_SEQ (select IFNULL(max(id),0)+1 from WF_HISTORY)
insert into WF_HISTORY_ACTION_SEQ (select IFNULL(max(id),0)+1 from WF_HISTORY_ACTION)
insert into ord_item_offerings_seq (select IFNULL(max(id),0)+1 from ord_item_offerings)
insert into ord_quot_item_offerings_seq (select IFNULL(max(id),0)+1 from ord_quot_item_offerings)
insert into bill_seq_it_sell_seq (select IFNULL(max(id),0)+1 from BILLING_SEQ_INVTYP_SELL)

changeSet.author: anasseh
changeSet.sql: update BILLING_INVOICE set pdf_generated = 1 where pdf is not null

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update dwh_account_operation set category=0 where category is null
update dwh_account_operation set status=0 where status is null
update dwh_account_operation set type=0 where type is null
